Pre-Game Insights: Ceddanne Rafaela will move to second base Saturday when shortstop Trevor Story (shoulder) will be activated off the injured list.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Ceddanne Rafaela has slumped of late, going 5-for-36 (.139) with 14 strikeouts over the last 11 contests.
Rafaela has been held hitless in eight at-bats through the first two games of the series.
Others: Rafaela needs to tighten his strike zone to lift his offense to the superb level of his defense.
The return of shortstop Trevor Story was initially expected to move Rafaela to second base, but Red Sox manager Alex Cora put him in the outfield.
